## `r paste(k)`

```{r include=FALSE}
len <- 0.3*length(unique(params$dat[[k]]))
```

```{r fig.height=len}
params$dat %>% count(var_c = params$dat[[k]]) %>% 
ggplot(aes(y=n, x=reorder(var_c, n), fill=var_c)) +
  geom_bar(stat='identity') +
  labs(title = paste0("Bar Plot of `", names(params$dat[k]),"`"),
       y = "Count",
       x = paste0(names(params$dat[k]))) +
  coord_flip() +
  guides(fill=FALSE)
```
